targets.expr:
kube_pod_info{
  node="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
}

sum(
  kube_node_status_capacity{
    resource="cpu",
    node="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }
)

sum(
  kube_node_status_capacity{
    resource="memory",
    node="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }
)

k8s_node_memory_usage_bytes{
  k8s_node_name="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
}

kube_node_status_capacity{
  resource="memory",
  node="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
}

k8s_node_memory_working_set_bytes{
  k8s_node_name="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
}

k8s_node_memory_rss_bytes{
  k8s_node_name="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
}

k8s_node_memory_available_bytes{
  k8s_node_name="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
}

(max(
  k8s_volume_capacity_bytes{
    k8s_node_name="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }) by (k8s_namespace_name, k8s_volume_name) - max(
  k8s_volume_available_bytes{
    k8s_node_name="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }) by (k8s_namespace_name, k8s_volume_name)) / max(
  k8s_volume_capacity_bytes{
    k8s_node_name="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }) by (k8s_namespace_name, k8s_volume_name)

max(
  k8s_volume_capacity_bytes{
    k8s_node_name="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }) by (k8s_namespace_name, k8s_volume_name) - max(
  k8s_volume_available_bytes{
    k8s_node_name="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }) by (k8s_namespace_name, k8s_volume_name)

max(
  k8s_volume_capacity_bytes{
    k8s_node_name="$node",
    app_name=~"$app_name",
    app_version=~"$app_version",
    region=~"$region",
    cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
    env=~"$env"
  }) by (k8s_namespace_name, k8s_volume_name)

(k8s_node_filesystem_usage_bytes{
  k8s_node_name="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
} / k8s_node_filesystem_capacity_bytes{
  k8s_node_name="$node",
  app_name=~"$app_name",
  app_version=~"$app_version",
  region=~"$region",
  cluster_id=~"$cluster_id",
  env=~"$env"
})

list.description:
This variable controls the mathematical function used to calculate per-second rates across the dashboard.

    Overview (rate): Calculates the average rate over the entire time interval. Best for spotting trends, capacity planning, and long-term views.

    Debug (irate): Calculates the "instant" rate based on the last two data points. Best for high-resolution troubleshooting and catching micro-spikes.

 Warning: irate should only be used when zoomed in to < 1 hour. On longer time ranges (e.g., 7 days), irate ignores most data points between pixels and will provide a misleading representation of your traffic.
list.label: Mode
list.name: rate_func
